verbs.description: President Donald Trump 's disclosure that [ARG0: he] " [V: reimbursed] " [ARG1: personal attorney Michael Cohen] [ARG3: for as much as $ 250,000] [ARGM-TMP: last year] comes in a footnote to his financial disclosure report ...
